title: 05/31/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 05/31/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin doesn’t believe LeBron has the shoulders needed to carry the Lakers without Anthony Davis into the Finals, and their roster is looking more like LeBron’s 2018 Cavaliers. With the Lakers’ injury woes, Colin sees the Clippers as the best team coming out of the West. If fans continue to act out during NBA games towards players, it’s time to add assault charges to let fans know that this type of behavior is no longer being tolerated. Green Bay has shown Aaron Rodgers time and time again that they don’t want to fix the relationship. Plus, another fan favorite edition of Where Colin Was Right / Wrong! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
